snippet: A program in Carnegie Hall’s Voices From Latin America series on Tuesday night featured four jazz pianists, Chucho Valdés, Gonzalo Rubalcaba, Danilo Pérez and Egberto Gismonti.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by several Latin jazz pianists as part of Carnegie Hall's Voices From Latin America series.
lead_paragraph: A program in Carnegie Hall’s Voices From Latin America series on Tuesday night featured four jazz pianists, Chucho Valdés, Gonzalo Rubalcaba, Danilo Pérez and Egberto Gismonti.

headline.seo: Chucho Valdés and Gonzalo Rubalcaba at Carnegie
headline.main: You Can Dance to It: Roots of Tradition With Improvisational Freedom
headline.print_headline: You Can Dance to It: Roots of Tradition With Improvisational Freedom
